summary: The emotional intricacies of a polyamorous relationship between young artist Bob and his two lovers: a lonely male doctor and a frustrated female office worker.
cast: Peter Finch|Glenda Jackson|Murray Head|Peggy Ashcroft|Tony Britton|Maurice Denham|Bessie Love|Vivian Pickles|Frank Windsor|Thomas Baptiste|Richard Pearson|June Brown|Hannah Norbert|Harold Goldblatt|Marie Burke|Caroline Blakiston|Peter Halliday|Douglas Lambert|Jon Finch|Kimi Tallmadge|Russell Lewis|Emma Schlesinger|Carl Ferber|Patrick Thornberry|Robert Rietty|Liane Aukin|Robin Presky|Edward Evans|Gabrielle Daye|George Belbin|Richard Loncraine|Royce Mills|Monica Vasileiou|John Rae|Ellis Dale|Joe Wadham|Henry Danziger|Ann Firbank|Derek Gilbert|William Job|John Warner|Nike Arrighi|Francis Ghent|Donald Sumpter|Rohan McCullough|Barbara Markham|Robert Wilde|Esta Charkham|Hilary Hardiman|Simon Joseph|Gideon Kolb|Martin Lawrence|Mercia Mansfield|Reuben Elvy|Jovey Douben|Henry Gilbert|Helen Lindsay|David Webb|Cindy Burrows|Daniel Day-Lewis|Jill Goldston|Murray Kash|Petra Markham
title: Domingo, maldito domingo
